item.title: Litter bin constantly overflowing, 26th February
item.description:
Litter bin on Carlton Grove outside Beasley House is constantly overflowing and not being collected. This appears to be the litter bin on Queens Road outside Sainsbury’s which has been moved. Can it be moved back as it isn’t being emptied and its current location is less impactful than outside Sainsbury’s?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2D;89, Carlton Grove, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
